Class InputHandling

Object
InputHandling
public class InputHandling extends Object
An input handler that prints custom messages and handles adversarial input
Since:
2022-11-11
Version:
1.0
Author:
Wesley Low

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static Date
    getDate()
    Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid Date input is received
    static Date
    getDateOnly()
    Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid Date input is received Date input does not ask for time, only month and day
    static int
    getInt(String message)
    Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid integer input is received
    static int
    getInt(String message, String errmessage, int lower, int upper)
    Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid integer input is received A lower and upper bound is set on user input, and an error message displays if user input is out of bounds
    static String
    getSeat(int cinemaID)
    Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid seat ID is received Seat ID bounds are dependent on cinema type, which is tied to its ID

    • getInt

      public static int getInt(String message)
      Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid integer input is received
      Parameters:
      message - Custom message to be printed
      Returns:
      User's integer input

    • getInt

      public static int getInt(String message, String errmessage, int lower, int upper)
      Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid integer input is received A lower and upper bound is set on user input, and an error message displays if user input is out of bounds
      Parameters:
      message - Custom message to be printed
      errmessage - Error message if user input is out of bounds
      lower - Lower bound of input
      upper - Upper bound of input
      Returns:
      Valid user input

    • getDate

      public static Date getDate()
      Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid Date input is received
      Returns:
      User's Date input

    • getDateOnly

      public static Date getDateOnly()
      Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid Date input is received Date input does not ask for time, only month and day
      Returns:
      User's Date input

    • getSeat

      public static String getSeat(int cinemaID)
      Prints a custom message, then loops until a valid seat ID is received Seat ID bounds are dependent on cinema type, which is tied to its ID
      Parameters:
      cinemaID - Cinema ID
      Returns:
      User's seat ID input
